title: 3rd game today league crashed
body:
[](http://file:///C:/Users/TiffnBren/Desktop/hellooooo.png) 

Sooo yea what's goin on? I even reinstalled and it's still doin this..It crashed 3 times today and each time I was not able to connect to the game.

replies.body: yep right there with yous and this bs -19 lp as well

This is likely related to content described in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I would recommend reading through it and if you are still experiencing issues, post in that thread.
the game is fked and it wont reconnected anymore un fix able for some people like me."/ inst this game so good
